Sections.Name: BetterRidingViewSettings
Sections.Description: Settings for the Better Riding View Mod.

Keys.Name: StayDownWhenLookingUp
Keys.Description: Without this, the UpAngleOffset is useless as the horse's position will not dynamically change down. StraightAngleOffset will still control where the horses's default position is at.

Keys.Name: UpAngleOffset
Keys.Description: Offset the Up Angle: what is considered looking straight up to the sky, where the horse will be positioned most towards the bottom.

Keys.Name: StraightAngleOffset
Keys.Description: Offset the Straight Angle: what is considered looking straight ahead, where the horse will be positioned centered on the screen, as usual.
